name: Moon Lunch
description:
Made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam

Your fellow astronauts have left for the Great Migration! But you overslept, and you are the only one left on the desk! Build a rocket and gather new materials to get back to your people!

WARNING

This game may contain loud noises because we don't know how sound works in Unity.

Tips:

You can press F1 to return to the controls screen. 

You can also use Q and E to rotate the ship slightly.

Soda cans can not be turned off!

The bed restores your cheese over time.

Wings increase turn speed.

Devs:

Spicecream

BenRa

DumbIdiot

Music:

Johanna von Pfeife - Devotional Dreaming
